Class ProductServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.adapters.service.ProductServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductService
@Service @RequestScope @Transactional public class ProductServiceImpl extends Object implements ProductService
An Example of Standard CRUD Operations in a Jpa Repository
